1234

Delivering Expertise and Knowledge in Industrial Manufacturing

Welcome to Power Plant Services (PPS)



Since 1998, PPS has been working with customer across a variety of industries, including Power Generation, Utilities , Pulp & Paper, Refineries, and Steel Mills. Our complete array of offerings includes Services, Parts, and Raw Materials—to help top industrial organizations ensure the availability of their most trusted assets and equipment.

Why PPS?

Power Plant Services has built a reputation as the emergency room for the Power Generation Industry with our outstanding turnaround times. Leveraging our extensive stock of OEM-specified materials, in-house manufacturing capabilities, and 24/7 response time allows us to meet your urgent needs.


PPS Services



PPS provides customers with a variety of services including Safety, Engineering, Open Clean Inspect & Close (OCIC), Field Repair & Machining, Shop Repairs, Rotating & Stationary Equipment, Pumps, Valves, Specialty Welding, and other specialized services.


Learn More


PPS Parts



PPS has the capability to manufacture an extensive array of parts for industrial equipment used in the Power Generation (Gas, Steam, Nuclear, Geothermal, and Wind), Pulp & Paper, Refinery, and Steel Mill industries worldwide.


Learn More


PPS Raw Materials



PPS stocks a variety of raw materials including Stainless Steels, Alloy Steels, and Nickel Alloys for a variety of industrial applications. Our inventory includes a wide range of shapes including round bars, square bars, rectangular bars, rings, sheets, and plates.


Learn More

PPS Related Companies

Join the PPS Mailing List

Stay in the know with our latest services, parts, and company updates.

PPS is an Essential Service Provider



The United States government has deemed Power Plant Services an “Essential Business” during the COVID-19 pandemic.  As such, we will continue to operate business as usual supporting all our customers and the critical industries they serve. If you have any questions or concerns, please contact us directly at:

Email: sales@ppsvcs.com

Phone: (708) 345-8600

Our entire PPS team is dedicated to ensuring our customers remain operational and profitable. Our company is available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, all 365 days a year.

Celebrating 20+ Years of Service



Power Plant Services presents an exceptional track record complemented with more than 200 years of combined experience within our management team. We continue to grow and expand our services, building on the proven knowledge and successes that keep our customers coming back. Trust PPS to deliver what your project needs—on-time and on-budget—regardless of its complexity, location or scope.

Industry Certifications & Credentials



Our commitment to the industries we serve includes achieving and maintaining world-class standards and certifications that open the door to working with the most demanding customers and serving the most complex of needs in a single-source supplier of parts and services.


See All Certifications

Customer Testimonials

“PPFS skilled craftsmen completed all our major and minor repairs on the blades and diaphragms in a timely manner. The quality control on these repairs was just unbelievable. All repairs were able to be completed at the plant saving on time and shipping costs.”

General Manager & Plant ManagerSikeston Power Station

“Thank you for the extra effort your company has once again provided us. The effort and customer service is out of this world.”

Project EngineerLouisville Gas and Electric Company and Kentucky Utilities Company

“On behalf of our company and our CEO, we wanted to express our appreciation and thanks for all your efforts during the past several months on our LP blade failure issue.  Looking back on the support you and your organization provided it was more than just repairing the diaphragms.  Your company was one of the first ones we met with in an effort to quickly get the unit repaired and back on line.”

Director, Special ProjectsPrimary Energy Recycling
